import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; function TaskItem(props) { return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}

) } export default TaskItem
